doc:
Leigh Ann Orsi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leigh_Ann_Orsi 0 Leigh Ann Orsi (born May 15, 1981 in California) is an American dancer and former actress. She is best known for playing Brad's (Zachery Ty Bryan) second girlfriend, Ashley, on the sitcom Home Improvement. Also featured as Hannah in the 1994 film, The Favor starring Brad Pitt. She also appeared for one season on the drama Life Goes On, as Zoe, Becka (Kellie Martin) and Corky's (Chris Burke) cousin. Her last acting credit was the 1994 film Pet Shop. Her younger sister Ginger Orsi is also a former actress. She was also on season 2 of The Showtime series " Polyamory: Married Dating " Orsi is now an avant-garde pole dancer and is the owner of "Be Spun", a pole dancing gym in Los Angeles, California. Leigh_Ann_Orsi ( born May_15 , 1981 in California ) is an_American_dancer and former_actress . She is_best_known for playing Brad 's_(_Zachery_Ty_Bryan_)_second_girlfriend , Ashley , on the_sitcom_Home_Improvement . Also featured as Hannah in the_1994_film , The_Favor starring Brad_Pitt . She also appeared for one_season on the_drama Life Goes On , as Zoe , Becka_(_Kellie_Martin_) and Corky 's_(_Chris_Burke_)_cousin . Her_last_acting_credit was the_1994_film_Pet_Shop . Her_younger_sister_Ginger_Orsi is also a_former_actress . She was also on season_2 of The_Showtime_series_"_Polyamory : Married_"_Orsi is now an_avant-garde_pole_dancer and is the_owner of " Be_Spun " , a_pole_dancing_gym in Los_Angeles , California .
